snippet.title: Winds Of Arcana: Ruination | Trailer
snippet.description:
The Game:
Winds Of Arcana: Ruination is a 2.5D Action Platformer featuring a souls-inspired combat system set in the treacherous and magical world of Lirna. Experience a powerful, lore-rich story as you discover magical trinkets, upgrade your abilities, and battle dangerous foes that stand in your way.

The Story:
Winds of Arcana: Ruination follows the story of Aryn, a young mercenary thrust into a dark odyssey of vengeance, magic, and hopelessness in a world being broken by an ancient wrath.

Try the game now!
http://bit.ly/3LFlpgy

Join our development journey!
https://lnkd.in/dDpWc83B

Music By @urizencomposer 

#platformer #soulslike #trailer #gaming #games #demo #steam #windsofarcana
